Telecommunications and information exchange between systems -- Local and metropolitan area networks -- Specific requirements -- Part 1Q: Bridges and bridged networks -- AMENDMENT 7: Cyclic queuing and forwarding

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The use of traffic scheduling and per-stream filtering and policing to support cyclic queuing and forwarding are described in this amendment to IEEE Std 8802.1Q-2016.
